reviews.review: An Adventure Beyond Words In A Bad Way Easily Worst Movie Of 2017 Bad Dialogue Bad Animation And Story That Desperatly Tries To Be Like Inside Out But Sony Once Again Proves That Their Way Of Thinking Money>Quality Doesnt Work On The Public 0.7/10

Yes I'm aware that this is a film for kids, but it's not a good film for kids. Kids deserve better movies, movies that aren't made purely for corporate interests in order to sell them Youtube, Spotify, Dance Dance Revolution, Candy Crush and whatever app is going to give those kids the cool new Emoji Movie Apps (Which I don't believe is out yet, but it will be and when it is I promise you it won't be free). It's not got anything interesting or original in it. It's competently made certainly, the frame size is consistant, there's maybe one line that got a laugh and the designs aren't awful to look at but... come on Sony, you can do better than this. You can do so much better than this.
Although with the bright colours and animation, The Emoji Movie has horrible jokes, story, dialogue and ideas. Easily one of the worst of the year

No word on planet earth could explain how bad the emoji movie is. I'm impressed that Sony was able to make a movie so garbage that a minecraft YouTuber couldn't make a worse movie if they tried. Don't make the same mistake I did and pay to watch this movie. The advertisement movie is something that people should be paid to watch.
Git gud and make emoticons great again ;)
So much wasted talent for one long phone app commercial.

If you liked the Angry Birds movie, you will love this films as well. Quentin Tarantino's dead half brother did a great job directing this insightful film targeting the pressure society has placed on emoji communication and how it is creating tension between the united states and north Korea. Overpopulation can be solved, if only we looked deeper into the hidden metaphors of this gripping and powerful movie.
worst movie in the whole wide universe!!!!! I don't recommend it ð~´ð~´ð~´ð~´ð~´ð~´
